text:
--Archimedes Colony,
ceremony venue, the area around the "Pillar of Light"
away from the examination zone.

From a certain coffee shop,
a satisfied-looking group of four
emerged, conversing.

name: Yoshiori
text:
—Whew, I ate so much!
The food from outside stores
really tastes different, doesn't it!

name: Melide
text:
Hehe. Yoshiori-oniichan,
you had quite the appetite, didn't you?
I wonder how many pancakes you had.

name: Monomasa
text:
...I wish you'd consider my position,
having to order on your behalf.
They must have thought I had an extreme sweet tooth.

name: Exio
text:
It's fine, no matter what anyone thinks.
The coffee was to my liking too.
It truly lives up to Yoshiori-kun's recommendation.

name: Yoshiori
text:
Hehe, if Exio-san is happy,
then I'm...

name: Monomasa
text:
...Honestly.
What a complaisant fellow.

The four walked down the street,
laughing.

name: Melide
text:
Hey, Exio-sama.
What should we do next?

name: Exio
text:
Ah, that's right.
Since we're here, why don't we
look around the shops in this area?

name: Exio
text:
It seems to be quite lively for the ceremony,
and there might be things you two would like,
don't you think?

name: Yoshiori
text:
Then, towards the "Pillar of Light"—
...Hm?Hey, watch your step, Melide.

As Melide stumbled on something,
Monomasa's arm caught her before she fell.

name: Monomasa
text:
Are you alright, Melide?
Are you perhaps getting carried away?
Be careful not to get hurt.

name: Melide
text:
Yes. Thank you, Monomasa.
But, this... what is it?

Melide picked up the object
that almost made her fall.

name: Yoshiori
text:
What is that...? Is it a part of something?
For junk discarded on the street,
it's quite well-made.

name: Monomasa
text:
It's made of quite a sturdy material.
I can't tell what it's used for, but...

Melide took the part in her hand
and gazed at it intently.

name: Melide
text:
I wonder if someone lost it.
...It has some scratches, but it feels like it was cherished very much.

name: Melide
text:
...Uhm, Exio-sama.
May I take this to the police's box later?
The person who lost it might be troubled.

name: Exio
text:
Ah, of course.
We have time, so let's take it there while we sightsee around.

name: Yoshiori
text:
...Heh. Even though there's no need to do that,
you still prioritize doing good deeds.
That's just like a hero.

name: Monomasa
text:
...We should also change ourselves accordingly.
After all, we are the members of a hero agency.

--At the same time.
Examination venue, observation seats.

name: Huckle
text:
--Yes, understood.
I will inform the agency members myself.

name: Huckle
text:
No, I'll make sure we can move
immediately in case of an emergency.
...Well then, excuse me.

Huckle, who had been on a call with someone
in the corner of the room,
ended the communication with a serious expression.

Then, he walked towards the members
who were watching the holographic projection
of the public examination.

name: Mokdai
text:
Welcome back, President. A call?
...Ah, look, something exciting's about to happen!

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, I received a sudden call
from the Operations Headquarters.

name: Huckle
text:
I apologize for interrupting your viewing,
but could everyone gather around?
There's something urgent I need to share.

At Huckle's call,
the Parallel Flight Inc. members nearby gathered.

name: Akashi
text:
What's the urgent matter, President?
The way you're bringing it up now,
I have a bad feeling about this...

name: Huckle
text:
Ah, it's not very good news.
The only ones left are Crowne and [Player]-kun...

Just then, Crowne appeared from the back hallway,
carrying a tray.

name: Crowne
text:
Oh, everyone's gathered. Just in time.
I brought a variety of drinks!

name: Crowne
text:
Let's relax a bit and enjoy ourselves, shall we?
...Huh, what's wrong?

name: Ryekie
text:
Ah, Huckle seems to have
something urgent to share.
Crowne, you come over here too!

name: Akashi
text:
...Hey, Crowne-san.
Have you seen [Player]?
They also went to get drinks.

name: Crowne
text:
Eh, no, I haven't seen them.
I haven't seen them on my way to and back,
so maybe they went to the restroom?

name: Sui
text:
[Player]-san, you're certainly late.
Are you okay...? I hope you haven't
gotten involved in something strange again.

name: Akashi
text:
They just went to get drinks, right?
No way... no, it's not impossible.
Should I send them a message...?

name: Huckle
text:
...Hmm. I'll contact [Player]-kun
separately later myself.

Huckle refocused his gaze on the members and
began speaking with a serious expression.

name: Huckle
text:
The Operations Headquarters will likely make a
general announcement soon, but we've received word that an anomaly
has been confirmed in the colony's ceiling section.

name: Huckle
text:
The detailed situation is currently under confirmation,
but it seems that a suspicious, ultra-small spaceship
was confirmed to have collided with the ceiling.

name: Mokdai
text:
A spaceship collided with the colony's ceiling!?
W-What does that even mean...?

name: Crowne
text:
W-Wait, Huckle!
Does that mean there was a spaceship launch
outside of the spaceport?

name: Huckle
text:
...Yes, a shock was detected in the ceiling section,
and the alarm system seems to have activated.

name: Huckle
text:
Although it's an ultra-small one, only about the size of one person,
it's an unauthorized suspicious spaceship...
And today is the day of a major ceremony.

name: Huckle
text:
Just in case of future incidents, the Operations Headquarters
will strengthen security around the "Pillar of Light."

name: Ryekie
text:
I see.
So, that's why they're calling out
to the heroes gathered for the ceremony.

At Ryekie's words, Huckle replied
while checking his own terminal.

name: Huckle
text:
Each hero agency is sequentially
switching to standby and alert status.
Our company will also follow suit.

name: Huckle
text:
The details are still under investigation, and many points are unclear,
but we cannot say for certain that there is no possibility
of terrorism or an incident.

name: Huckle
text:
In case of emergency, a dispatch request will come.
Please keep that in mind, everyone.

name: Huckle
text:
I intend to inform Monomasa and the others outside the venue as well.
Please cooperate as needed.

The members of Parallel Flight Inc.
quietly nodded at their president's words.
Just then, they were called out to from behind.

name: Flamier
text:
--Excuse me for interrupting your conversation.
Has anyone seen a child in a spacesuit?

The people around them turned their gaze.
Flamier and Andrew, who appeared,
seemed a little out of breath.

name: Sui
text:
Flamier-san, Andrew-san?
What's wrong, has something happened...?

name: Flamier
text:
Sui-sama, and everyone from Parallel Flight Inc.
Please forgive us for not greeting you.

name: Flamier
text:
Our friend's whereabouts have been unknown for a while now...
Does anyone know where he might be?

name: Andrew
text:
We're looking for this child.
Could someone tell us if they've seen him?

Andrew displayed a holographic image
of a person in a spacesuit on his palm.

name: Ryekie
text:
...No, I haven't seen him.
I'm sorry, both of you.

name: Mokdai
text:
Hmm, I haven't seen him either.
I've been here watching the public exam the whole time...

name: Crowne
text:
If I had passed by him, that outfit would have left an impression...
What about the others?

At Crowne's words,
Akashi and Huckle also shook their heads.

name: Flamier
text:
I see, thank you.
...It seems no one has seen him around here.

name: Flamier
text: Orbiter-san, where could you have gone...?

name: Huckle
text:
Since you're having trouble,
we'll contact you immediately if we see him.
It's Orbiter-san, correct?

name: Andrew
text:
Yes, thank you, everyone!
That helps a lot!

name: Akashi
text:
Ah, hey.
Have you two seen [Player]?

At Akashi's words,
Flamier and Andrew exchanged glances.

name: Flamier
text:
[Player]-sama?
No, I haven't seen them ever since I moved from
the ceremony venue to the observation seats.

name: Andrew
text:
I haven't seen them either.
Did [Player]-san also suddenly disappear?

name: Akashi
text:
Ah, no, they just went to get drinks,
but they are taking a while to come back...

name: Akashi
text:
I just thought I'd ask if you knew anything.
I'll try contacting [Player] myself as well.

name: Flamier
text:
Yes, understood.
Then, if we see them,
we'll call out to them.

Having said that, Flamier and Andrew bowed to the
Parallel Flight Inc. group and left the area.

name: Mokdai
text:
Both of them seemed very worried.
Are they okay...?

name: Huckle
text:
There are also sightings of a suspicious spaceship.
I hope there's no connection...

name: Huckle
text:
Even if it's something trivial.
If we have any information about Orbiter-san,
we'll contact them immediately.

name: Huckle
text:
...We also need to
contact [Player]-kun first.

Andrew and Flamier looked around the observation seats,
attempting to contact Orbiter.

name: Flamier
text:
...How is it, Andrew?
Have you received any contact from Orbiter-san?

name: Andrew
text:
No, he's not answering at all.
I've sent several messages, but there's no response.

name: Andrew
text:
--No, wait.
My Lady, one timed message
has arrived, I'll read it aloud!

Andrew read the message aloud
to a surprised Flamier.

name: Orbiter
text:
『Flamier, Andrew.
I'm sorry for disappearing without a word.
But, I have to go.』

name: Orbiter
text:
『I received so much help,
and I can't properly express my gratitude,
but I'm very thankful to both of you.』

name: Orbiter
text:
『Thank you.
See you again, both of you!
--Orbiter』

The message ended there,
and Andrew quietly clenched his fist.

name: Andrew
text:
...I'm sorry, My Lady.
Even though I'm his guarantor,
I took my eyes off him.

name: Andrew
text:
...This is my responsibility.
I should have paid more attention
to his actions.

name: Flamier
text:
No, that's not true.
It was so sudden,
even I didn't notice.
The two exchanged worried glances.

name: Flamier
text:
Since Orbiter-san's condition was said to be fine,
I believe his body is alright, but...

name: Andrew
text:
...Yes, I also wouldn't agree to let him go outside
alone in his current state.

name: Flamier
text:
...He might not have gone far yet.
Let's search a little more.

name: Andrew
text:
Understood, My Lady.
I'll expand the search sensor's range.

At those words,
Flamier nodded with a serious expression.

name: Flamier
text:
--Yes.
Surely, Orbiter-san will be safe.
Andrew, let's go.

Chapter 3:
Searching for the Radiance

--Within the examination area,
a corner of the model city area.

There, the clashing sounds of Parallel Weapons
rang out in a fierce battle.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Whoa!
T-This examinee is strong...!
Hey, sensei, are you okay!?

name: Subaru
text:
Y-Yes, I was planning to go easy since it's an exam,
but that thought vanished in five seconds...

name: Subaru
text:
For some reason, even though [Player]-san and
Pubraseer-san are on the enemy side,
their skill is sufficient...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Ah!
New techniques are being etched into my body.
More... show me more!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Gaisei
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Come now, the feast has just begun.
I shall enjoy myself to the fullest!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah, if they're real villains, now would be the perfect chance.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...But, [Player].
Look at Subaru and the others.
The scenario seems to be progressing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That's right.
The moment the opponent seems to be flinching, it's a "golden opportunity."

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yotaro
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...But, [Player].
They don't seem to want to fight anymore, do they?

text:
Observing their reactions,
Subaru and Hydoor kept their distance.
And then...

The two released their transformations
and wore malicious smiles.

name: Subaru
text:
...You're quite capable.
I'll acknowledge that you have
enough skill to be boastful.

name: Hydoor
text:
Hmph, listen, you!
I've properly memorized that face of yours!

name: Gaisei
text: ...What are you talking about?

Against the two who suddenly lost their will to fight,
Gaisei muttered with a straight face.

name: Gaisei
text:
If you are a villain,
shouldn't you show your pride until the end?
--Come, this unworthy one can still fight!

name: Hydoor
text:
Shut up, when I say it's over, it's over!
Besides, me being a villain
is a thing of the past!

At Hydoor's words,
Yotaro reacted slightly,
observing him intently.

name: Yotaro
text:
...I see. He's also
a hero who used to be a villain, huh?

name: Subaru
text:
...Hydoor-san.
You are a villain "now",
so please don't forget your role.

name: Hydoor
text:
I-I know, sensei!
Tch, you're throwing me off...
Seriously, let's start this over from the top!

name: Subaru
text:
Indeed, I never expected
an encore battle from the examinee's side...

Clearing their throats, Subaru and
Hydoor once again put on villainous expressions
and intentionally raised their voices.

name: Hydoor
text:
...Ah, ahem.
Don't get cocky, you punks!
Next time, I won't go easy on you!

name: Hydoor
text:
At that time, I'll beat the rules of this "territory"
into your very being!!

name: Subaru
text:
You seem to have some "manners",
so for today, I'll let you off with this.

name: Subaru
text:
Be sure to wash your neck
and wait for us.
...Until then.

name: Hydoor & Subaru
text: --Remember our words!!

name: Pubraseer
text:
『...No sooner had they uttered their parting words,
the two villains vanished like the wind, running off.』

name: Pubraseer
text:
...
Their performance
is over now.

name: Pubraseer
text:
For now, I'll say good work, [Player].
...Even though the misunderstanding wasn't resolved in the end.

options.text: So this is part of the exam, huh?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that was something Hydoor brought in.
Subaru was quite upset because he had to make some last-minute corrections to it.

options.text: What was that really all about...?

note: [This choice will only be available if you picked Option 2]

options.text: Those two are surprisingly close, huh...?

text:
Muttering that, the two once again
turned to face the "real" villains.

name: Gaisei
text:
...It's utterly disappointing.
The blissful moment that could have been
ended in such a way.

Gaisei, with an expression that clearly showed
he wasn't amused, snorted.

name: Pubraseer
text:
This is an exam, you see.
It doesn't merely measure the pure strength of battle.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Although there's a scenario,
it tests how examinees deal with it.
The process itself is important.

name: Gaisei
text:
...How very humbling.
Such a noble idea is beyond
the comprehension of this unworthy one.

Behind Gaisei, who was muttering to himself,
Yotaro also sighed.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Haa.
At least there seems to be no damage anywhere,
so that's good.

name: Yotaro
text:
Even though it's a model city, if you destroy everything,
I can't even imagine how much the repair costs would be...

name: Pubraseer
text:
You, on the other hand, are worried about repair costs...?
Somehow, your perspective is unique...

name: Yotaro
text:
Well, when I usually act with Gaisei-kun,
a lot of things around us get destroyed.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Let me tell you one thing,
this unworthy one doesn't prefer destructive activities.
I just slice things when they get in the way.

name: Yotaro
text:
Yup, the person usually who slices
everything around him is saying that, alright...

name: Yotaro
text:
Sometimes the repair costs even exceed the earnings from being a bodyguard.
That's what you call "putting the cart before the horse."

name: Pubraseer
text:
No, that's not what I was pointing out...
By the way, Gaisei is a bodyguard, is he?

options.text: That's the hidden side of villains, huh?
Before, he abandoned his employer, but...

text:
While conversing, Yotaro looked at his own terminal,
observing his surroundings.

On it, the latest news from the Earth Sphere,
before it was even widely reported,
was scrolled by at an incredible speed.

name: Yotaro
text:
(...Hmm.
It seems we're not being talked about yet.)

name: Yotaro
text:
(And judging by the examiner's reaction earlier,
it seems Gaisei-kun will get a decent score.)

name: Yotaro
text:
(However, this hero in front of me
seems to be an examiner as well...
And [Player] is also here.)

name: Yotaro
text:
(If things go wrong, it's "over".
Are we in a pinch already...?
Well, there's no other choice but to handle it well.)

Closing his terminal,
Yotaro sighed once more and
called out to Pubraseer.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Anyway, I apologize for earlier.
We are indeed villains,
but we're participating in this exam.

name: Yotaro
text:
Besides, examinees who don't have licenses from other planets
are treated the same as us, as villains,
in the Earth Sphere, right?

name: Yotaro
text:
So... to be frank,
could you overlook this?

name: Yotaro
text:
We plan to behave during the exam,
so please consider it.

Yotaro bowed his head.
At his unguarded posture, Pubraseer and [Player] exchanged glances.

name: Gaisei
text:
..."Observer."
What arbitrary things
are you saying?

name: Gaisei
text:
This unworthy one has not yet
had a satisfying battle.
What did I come here for?

name: Yotaro
text:
...Gaisei-kun.
As we discussed earlier,
we're here to take the exam.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Well then, the warm-up is over,
so let's get to the main event.

name: Gaisei
text:
[Player]-dono, this time,
you will show this unworthy one your command.

name: Yotaro
text:
Gaisei-kun, wait!
You don't understand our current situation,
do you!?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hey, [Player].
Could I have a moment?

Ignoring the two who had started arguing,
Pubraseer secretly lowered his voice and spoke to [Player].

options.text: What should we do about them...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hmm.
I don't know what they're arguing about either...

name: Pubraseer
text:
They say they're villains, and we need to consider
on how to deal with them, but they don't seem to be
lying that they came to take the exam.

Pubraseer opened his terminal
and displayed the list of examinees.
Gaisei's name was on it.

options.text: What kind of back channel did he use to apply?

name: Pubraseer
text:
From what you've told me,
they don't seem to have reformed,
but they did come to take the exam...

name: Pubraseer
text:
However, they seem to have some goal,
but they don't appear to be plotting any evil
that would cause chaos in this place.

name: Pubraseer
text:
If that's the case, I'd like to prioritize
resolving your problem first.
What do you think?

options.text: Is that really alright for you...?

text: Pubraseer nodded at [Player]'s words.

name: Pubraseer
text:
If you are in danger, then that's another matter,
but it would be best to request assistance
from the Operations' Headquarters regarding them.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Could you leave this to me, [Player]?
...I have an idea.

Pubraseer let out a strong laugh and
turned back to the two villains.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah... Gaisei.
I believe I understand your wish.
You want to fight us, right?

name: Gaisei
text:
--Yes, that's right!
Pubraseer-dono, I am filled with admiration
for your wisdom.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Geez, Gaisei-kun!
I'm trying to settle things peacefully,
so why are you making a fuss?

Pubraseer cleared his throat and
caught the attention of the two.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...You two want to battle
to train your skills, is that it?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Although it was unintentional, by fighting together,
I believe I've come to understand that a little.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...However, it seems
that after the previous battle,
I've accumulated some fatigue.

Pubraseer let out an
intentionally loud sigh.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Both I and [Player],
if we were to battle you two,
then we would want to face you in perfect condition...

name: Pubraseer
text:
Gaisei, what do you say?
Could you wait a bit for us to recover?
That way, I can show you even better techniques.

name: Gaisei
text:
...Is that what you mean?
That techniques should be honed
only when both are at their best.

Gaisei grinned, looked at [Player] and the others,
and released his transformation.

options.text: That's certainly some acting you've got there...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Pubraseer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...U-Uhm, please don't say that too loudly.
They might hear you.
...And, it's a little embarrassing.

name: Gaisei
text:
For this unworthy one,
there is meaning in crossing swords in perfect condition,
and defeating that strength.

name: Gaisei
text:
...From you,
the fighting spirit has not vanished.
Even this unworthy one can feel that.

name: Gaisei
text:
If you do not turn your back,
then it is only natural to wait for that.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Gaisei-kun, I'm grateful,
but you're actually being talked into something.
Are you really sure about this?

name: Gaisei
text:
It's fine.
I felt Pubraseer-dono's strength
right next to me just now.

name: Gaisei
text:
If it is possible to engrave
that strength into the body of this unworthy one,
then there is joy in waiting.

name: Gaisei
text:
Previously, [Player]-dono taught me that
a little patience makes the feast more exciting...!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, that's right.
They say that pleasant times
feel like they pass quickly!

options.text: You're getting them all fired up to fight, but...
...No, let's focus on my own problem first.

text:
Just as [Player] sighed softly,
at that moment-

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hm...?
What's that sound?
N-No way...!

options.text: This sound, it's a sign that I'm about to be warped!

text:
[Player] hurriedly checked their terminal,
the source of the sound.

name: Pubraseer
text:
This is the alert you mentioned, isn't it?
Could you show it to me?
There's a possibility the terminal is damaged.

With [Player]'s nodding in response, Pubraseer took
their arm and leaned in to look at the terminal.

name: Gaisei
text:
...What is this sound?
It's troublesome if you don't recover
as quickly as possible.

name: Gaisei
text:
With such a grating sound ringing,
it's impossible to relax.

name: Yotaro
text:
Something seems strange, doesn't it?
The intervals are getting shorter and shorter...

name: Pubraseer
text:
U-Uhm...
Nothing seems to be broken, though...

As the two villains with puzzled expressions gazed at [Player],
the sound reached a familiar speed.

options.text: Just when I finally met people I know--!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...W-What is this light!?
Wait--

Along with the words of [Player] and Pubraseer,
a momentary blue light enveloped the surroundings dazzlingly.

name: Yotaro
text:
...W-What was that!?
............
The two of them disappeared...?

name: Yotaro
text:
G-Gaisei-kun...?
What's wrong?

Gaisei quietly stepped towards the spot where [Player]
had been standing just moments before.

There, a single unfamiliar processed item,
seemingly made of reinforced plastic,
lay rolling.

name: Yotaro
text:
Is this... a part of something?
Did [Player] drop it, or is it
related to them disappearing just now...?

As if uninterested, Gaisei silently turned on his heel,
and started walking off somewhere.

name: Yotaro
text:
H-Hey, Gaisei-kun!
Where are you going!?

name: Gaisei
text:
...This unworthy one has no intention
of missing a blissful moment.
I shall search for [Player]-dono.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Haa, you seem to really like them, don't you?
Certainly, their operational skill was amazing, but...

name: Yotaro
text:
It was good enough that we weren't caught,
but to go looking for them ourselves,
that's like "a moth flying into a flame."

name: Gaisei
text:
...While the strength of the heroes who battled and fled earlier was considerable,
[Player]-dono is exceptional--

name: Gaisei
text:
They possess a talent for combat command that
surpasses this unworthy one's imagination.
...And true strength as well.

name: Gaisei
text:
Do you think this unworthy one would
miss such an opportunity to know such strength?

After saying that, Gaisei averted his gaze
from Yotaro and continued walking again.

To his back, Yotaro quietly muttered in
a voice so low no one could hear.

name: Yotaro
text:
...[Player].
It's unfair that you can
make Gaisei-kun say such things.

name: Yotaro
text:
While being an "Observer",
and to stand on the public stage with a hero
and serve as an operator...

name: Yotaro
text:
But...
If [Player] is an "Observer",
then surely they too...

Yotaro shook his head slightly,
shaking off the thoughts that bubbled up in his mind.
Then, he followed Gaisei's retreating back.

name: Yotaro
text:
...Well, it's natural, in a way,
that you'd make a fuss about [Player], Gaisei-kun.

name: Yotaro
text:
Haa, it can't be helped.
Once you're like this, you absolutely won't listen to me.
Understood, I'll go too.

name: Gaisei
text:
"Observer," good judgment.
Surely, [Player]-dono is testing
this unworthy one's strength.

name: Yotaro
text:
...No, I definitely think that's not the case.
Well, if it's just you, I'll never be able to
guess what you might break, Gaisei-kun.

name: Yotaro
text:
If you're going to search, that's fine,
but once it's over, you'll still take the exam properly, alright?

--Immediately after the two left,
a certain person appeared there.

name: Denebola
text:
...Not here either.
Where did it go, my exam ticket...!?

name: Denebola
text:
Damn it, the remaining time
for the exam is dwindling rapidly...!
...Hm?

Denebola found a part
rolling on the ground.

name: Denebola
text:
Is this, the spaceship part
Orbiter was talking about...?

What he picked up was light and hard,
matching the description he had heard from Orbiter.

name: Denebola
text:
If this is what [Player]
took from Orbiter--

name: Denebola
text:
There's a possibility
that [Player] is nearby...!

Denebola vigorously activated his terminal,
displayed the contact screen for Orbiter,
and began typing characters.

Then, after sending a confirmation message,
he carefully observed his surroundings,
searching for any sign of a person.

name: Denebola
text:
--Where are you, [Player]!?
I'll find you right away...!!

--Within the examination area, the model city.
A certain corner of it.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...W-Where is this?
That's right, [Player]!

options.text: This time you are with me, Pubraseer-san!
See, it's just as I said, isn't it...?

text:
Pubraseer and [Player], blinded by the light,
closed their eyes for a moment, and then were warped
to yet another unfamiliar place.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...U-Uhm. Now that I've experienced it myself,
I realize you've been feeling this sudden anxiety
and fear all this time.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Even so, it's still a strange phenomenon...
It's fortunate that you haven't been injured so far.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Also, I was able to warp with you,
but I don't see Gaisei and Yotaro nearby...

name: Pubraseer
text:
Just in case,
I'll report them to the Operations' Headquarters.
Leaving them be might cause problems.

Once he released his transformation,
Pubraseer sent a message on his terminal.

Meanwhile, [Player] looked around to
confirm the current situation.

options.text: It feels the same as before...
There doesn't seem to be any regularity so far...

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hmm.
But this time, I warped with you.
Is the reason the distance...?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Because I was closest to you, perhaps?
I can't say for sure since I don't know
the warping principle in detail, but-

name: Pubraseer
text:
At the very least,
when the previous warning sound starts again,
I'll hold your hand in the same way.

name: Pubraseer
text:
That way, you won't be sent off somewhere alone...
Hopefully.
[Player] nodded at Pubraseer's words.

Just then, from deep within a nearby bush,
the sound of someone running heavily approaching was heard.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hm?
Is someone coming this way?

name: Orbiter
text:
--[Player]!!
I finally found you--!
I was looking for you--!

options.text: I can't believe we'd meet again!

text:
Orbiter ran towards [Player],
innocently jumping at them.

name: Orbiter
text:
You suddenly disappeared!
I was so surprised--...
I really looked for you!

name: Orbiter
text:
Ah, is the person next to you
this time [Player]'s friend?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, I am Pubraseer.
I've known [Player] for a while now.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I've heard about you, Orbiter.
It seems you've wandered into
this examination venue.

name: Orbiter
text:
U-Uhm, yeah, that's right....
I want to get out of here,
so I'm looking for parts of my broken spaceship-

name: Orbiter
text:
Oh, right, [Player]!
You took my part, didn't you!?
I'm in trouble without it...!

options.text: Was it the one you showed me earlier?

text:
Pressed by Orbiter,
[Player] checked their belongings.
However-

name: Orbiter
text:
...Wh-!?
Y-You lost it!?
N-No way...!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Perhaps it was during
the battle earlier.

name: Pubraseer
text:
The villains were there too,
and we were moving around intensely...

options.text: Let's go look for it together.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Uhm, [Player] also suddenly disappeared,
there's a reason for that, right?

name: Orbiter
text:
Sorry for getting you involved
when you were in trouble...
That's my fault.

name: Orbiter
text:
--Oh, right!
I have to contact Denebola!
To tell them I met [Player].

options.text: Perhaps he's on the search for me too?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah, he woke up right
after you disappeared, [Player].

name: Orbiter
text:
Then, he said we should
search for you separately, [Player].

Orbiter nodded in response
to [Player]'s words.

name: Orbiter
text:
Denebola said he was looking for his exam ticket.
[Player], do you have it?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Earlier, when I checked my belongings,
a card that looked like an exam ticket was mixed in.
That must be Denebola's.

[Player] took out the card
with the name "Denebola" written on it.

name: Orbiter
text:
Good, then I'll tell Denebola that.
He'll probably come right away, don't you think?

name: Orbiter
text:
Then, help me
collect my parts, [Player]!

Orbiter sent a message to Denebola
on his terminal.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Speaking of which, [Player].
It would be good to contact your agency members one more time now.

name: Pubraseer
text:
It's been so hectic lately, there hasn't been
time to for you to contact them in peace...

At Pubraseer's words,
[Player] checked their terminal.

It displayed notifications that Huckle
and Akashi had called several times.

They quickly called back,
and received an immediate response.

options.text: Akashi, sorry for making you worry.
President, sorry for the late contact...!

name: Akashi
text:
--[Player]!
President, everyone!
[Player] finally replied back!

name: Akashi
text:
Where are you now...!?
P-Pubraseer-san...?
Why are you with them?

name: Huckle
text:
[Player]-kun, it seems you tried to contact us earlier.
I have something to tell you too, but--

name: Huckle
text:
...Are you caught up in an emergency?
First, tell me your situation.

[Player] explained the events
that had occurred so far, step by step,
to the members of Parallel Flight Inc.

name: Crowne
text:
...Suddenly repeating warps, huh.
This is quite an inexplicable story.

name: Sui
text:
But, I'm glad [Player]-san was found.
We had just checked all the restrooms
in the vicinity...

name: Mokdai
text:
You were taking so long, so everyone was
worried you might have collapsed somewhere.

name: Ryekie
text:
Ah, I never imagined you'd be inside the examination area...
No wonder we couldn't find you.

name: Huckle
text: Pubraseer-san, I apologize,care of [Player]-kun?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, of course.
I intend to accompany them
until the problem is resolved.

name: Pubraseer
text:
I'm also concerned about the villains' movements.
Of course, I'll guarantee [Player]'s safety.

Huckle bowed his head
to Pubraseer.

name: Crowne
text:
Alright then, I'll look into the warp problem in a bit.
I'll also confirm with the control room.

name: Crowne
text:
[Player], could you send me your
terminal's operation history logs for investigation?

name: Crowne
text:
If I find anything,
I'll contact you back immediately.

options.text: Understood, I'll send it right away.

name: Huckle
text:
...Ah, and one more thing.
I received a call from the Operations' Headquarters--

name: Huckle
text:
It seems there was an incident where a suspicious small spaceship
collided with the colony's ceiling.

name: Huckle
text:
Due to the risk of terrorism,
we are to be careful.
[Player]-kun, please be careful too.

[Player] replied to Huckle and the others,
then ended the call.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hmm, the possibility of terrorists, huh...
We even have villains here,
what should we do...?

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player], Pubraseer.
Are you done talking now?

Orbiter, perhaps having finished sending the message
to Denebola, poked his head out from behind a tree.

options.text: ...Orbiter, I need to talk to you.
It might be hard to keep it a secret...
You might be in big trouble, you know?

name: Orbiter
text:
...Huh?
W-What's wrong?
Did I do something...?

name: Mokdai
text:
--But, that's good, isn't it?
You got in contact with [Player]!

name: Akashi
text: ...Y-Yeah, that's right...

name: Sui
text:
What's wrong, Akashi-san?
You were so worried earlier.

name: Akashi
text:
U-Ugh, shut up!
Of course I'd be worried!
...No, that's not it!

name: Akashi
text:
Just before the call ended,
I thought I saw someone I'd seen somewhere before-

name: Akashi
text:
It might have been my imagination,
but could that have been a "spacesuit"
just now?

name: Orbiter
text:
--I-I'm being thought of
as a terrorist...!?

options.text: It's rare for someone to hit the ceiling.

name: Pubraseer
text: Ah, that message also reached me...

name: Pubraseer
text:
I didn't tell you two to avoid making you anxious...
But I never thought such a misunderstanding would arise.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Hm? Does that mean
the flying object I saw in the locker room
was you, Orbiter?

name: Orbiter
text:
U-Uhm...
I've caused trouble for so many people...
right?

name: Orbiter
text:
I'm sorry, [Player].
I never thought it would
turn out like this...

Pubraseer spoke to a dejected
and crestfallen Orbiter.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Everyone makes mistakes at first.
Especially with space flight.

name: Pubraseer
text:
You didn't even know
there was a ceiling in the moon colony, did you?
That itself can't be helped.

name: Pubraseer
text:
...However, what's important is to think
about how it could have been avoided,
and then how to apply that to the next time.

Pubraseer took Orbiter's hand and continued speaking.
A glimpse of kindness could be seen there.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Orbiter, you have a very important heart
that honestly admits and accepts your mistakes.

name: Pubraseer
text:
So, let's go apologize properly.
If you convey it straightforwardly,
it will surely get through.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Yeah.
Okay, I think so too.
I'll apologize properly.

options.text: We have to clear up the misunderstanding, right?

note:
It's very much unrelated to the current circumstances,
but I find it very funny that Google Translate would translate
Option 2 (安心して、オービター) to "Rest in peace, Orbiter."

name: Orbiter
text:
...Thank you, [Player].
From now on, I'll think a lot more
before I act.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hahaha, with that spirit, you'll be fine!
Even I made nothing but mistakes
when I was a new astronaut.

name: Orbiter
text:
...Eh, Pubraseer,
you were an astronaut!?

Orbiter jumped up, his eyes sparkling,
and gazed at Pubraseer.

name: Pubraseer
text:
Ah, that's right.
Though I may look like this,
I used to be a spaceship captain.

name: Pubraseer
text:
More than 'before'...
for you, it might be more accurate to say
'a long, long time ago.'

name: Orbiter
text:
Whoa, that's amazing, amazing!
A captain!?
That's so cool!!

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, hey, Captain!
What kind of things do captains do?
What planets have you been to?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Hehe.
Oh, Orbiter, are you
interested in being an astronaut?

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah!
I'm going to be an astronaut in the future!
A super cool astronaut!

name: Orbiter
text:
Ah--! [Player]!
You don't believe me, do you!?
My feelings are real!

name: Orbiter
text:
--Oh, right!
Hey, [Player].
Can you transform me too!

name: Orbiter
text:
[Player] is an operator,
so you can transform me too, right?

name: Orbiter
text:
Then, could you show me
what I would look like as an astronaut!?

name: Orbiter
text:
I don't know if I'm a hero...
but I can transform!

name: Orbiter
text:
The doctor told me to keep
it a secret from others, but...

name: Orbiter
text:
With [Player] and Captain, I'm sure it'll be fine!
Come on, hurry, hurry!

Like responding to his words, [Player]'s terminal emitted a faint light.
It was a sign that a suitable individual was nearby.

name: Mobile Terminal
text:
Parallel universe path detected.
Hero name: Unregistered.
Target: Orbiter.

name: Mobile Terminal
text:
--Connect path?
If you wish to begin operation,
please tap "OK."

[Player] approved it.
Then, Orbiter, enveloped in light,
appeared in his transformed state.

name: Orbiter
text:
Eheheh, how is it, good, right!?
Even I can fight to protect my spaceship!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...The dream of an astronaut, huh.
Ah, how nostalgic.
It reminds me of old times...

Seeing his transformed figure,
Pubraseer narrowed his eyes, looking dazzled.

A peaceful atmosphere
settled among the three.
But just then-

name: Orbiter
text:
...Uwah!?
M-monsters!?

name: Pubraseer
text:
--No, wait, [Player].
These are small robots for the exam.

name: Pubraseer
text:
They are endlessly roaming
within the examination area.
Examinees get points for defeating them.

The appearing robot monsters hopped around in the nearby grass,
showing no signs of attacking.

And, after looking around,
similar robots were everywhere.

options.text: Oh, right, the exam is still ongoing...
They look just like the real thing, don't they...?

text:
[Player] relaxed their shoulders and sighed in relief.
And then-

A chilling, unpleasant sensation
crawled up [Player]'s spine.

options.text: -A real monster is mixed in there!
No, there was a monster after all!

text:
[Player] hurriedly transformed Pubraseer,
then turned their gaze to the surrounding monsters.

name: Pubraseer
text:
W-What!?
Which one is the real one...?
[Player], can you tell?

name: Pubraseer
text:
Even if they are robotic,
if we attack them,
they will retaliate.

name: Pubraseer
text:
It's better to ignore the robots
than to attack them aimlessly.

options.text: Even so, there are so many...!
T- Probably that one... no, that one over there?

text:
[Player] tried to trace the monster's presence,
but perhaps because the presence was faint,
they couldn't pinpoint its location.

name: Orbiter
text:
Hey, [Player].
I'll fight with Captain too!

name: Orbiter
text:
With this many of them,
it'll be faster if we're together, right?
Leave it to me!

name: Orbiter
text:
It's okay!
Danger is part of a great
space adventure!

name: Orbiter
text:
I want to show you two that
I can fight properly too!

name: Pubraseer
text:
...Uhm.
If we don't know the exact location of the enemy,
it might not be good to isolate ourselves foolishly.
Pubraseer confirmed the positions of Orbiter and [Player].

name: Pubraseer
text:
It can't be helped, we have to reduce their numbers somehow.
[Player], I'm counting on you for our operation!

name: Pubraseer
text:
Let's fight together, Orbiter.
When it's over, let's have a long, good conversation.
Now, follow me!

name: Orbiter
text:
Yeah!
Alright, I'll do my best!
Battle Start
